tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE press_coverage (
    coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coverage_date DATE,
    coverage_source VARCHAR(100),
    coverage_type VARCHAR(50),
    coverage_summary TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE press_releases (
    release_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    release_date DATE,
    release_title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    contact_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES media_contacts(contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE press_coverage (
    coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coverage_date DATE,
    coverage_source VARCHAR(255),
    coverage_type VARCHAR(50),
    release_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (release_id) REFERENCES press_releases(release_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pr_firm_info (
  firm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  firm_name VARCHAR(255),
  firm_address VARCHAR(255),
  firm_phone VARCHAR(20),
  firm_website VARCHAR(100)
);
